company.name: Scale Exotics
company.tagline: The proven system that fills your fleet with premium bookings—on autopilot
company.tagline_alt: The all in one growth engine for rental fleets
company.meta_description: Learn how to scale your exotic car rental business to $50k/month+ with our automated booking assistant
company.mission: We believe exotic car rental businesses deserve better than manual lead chasing and inconsistent revenue. Our mission is to give every fleet owner the automated systems they need to scale predictably.
company.elevator_pitch: We help exotic car rental fleet owners build automated systems that generate consistent $50k+ months on autopilot

testimonials.quote: We went from struggling to fill weekdays to being fully booked 3 weeks out. The lead quality is insane.
testimonials.author: Marcus J.

testimonials.quote: The automation alone saved me 20+ hours a week. Now I focus on growing the fleet instead of chasing leads.
testimonials.author: David R.

testimonials.quote: Went from $18k to $52k/month in 90 days. Scale Exotics knows exactly what works in this industry.
testimonials.author: Anthony M.

testimonials.quote: I was skeptical at first—I'd been burned by agencies before. But within 30 days, I had more qualified leads than I knew what to do with.
testimonials.author: Alex R.

testimonials.quote: The AI assistant is a game-changer. I woke up to 3 bookings last Tuesday. All closed while I was sleeping.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

testimonials.quote: Finally, a team that actually understands the exotic rental business. They speak our language.
testimonials.author: David K.

core_offerings.name: Lead Magnet
core_offerings.description: Pulls high intent renters toward your fleet using targeted acquisition loops, automated funnels, and content that attracts people already ready to book.

core_offerings.name: Conversion System
core_offerings.description: Handles responses instantly, qualifies prospects, and moves them through a frictionless booking path built specifically for exotic and luxury rentals.

core_offerings.name: Insight Engine
core_offerings.tagline: See the entire business with absolute clarity
core_offerings.description: Tracks performance, forecasts demand, and exposes revenue opportunities before your competitors even notice.

four_pillars.name: Attract
four_pillars.description: Bring qualified traffic via Instagram, Google, and referral networks

four_pillars.name: Capture
four_pillars.description: High-converting funnels optimized for YOUR booking process

four_pillars.name: Nurture
four_pillars.description: 24/7 AI that knows your vehicles and pricing

four_pillars.name: Convert
four_pillars.description: Streamlined booking management and customer CRM

dashboard_features: Inbox - All conversations in one place

details.guarantee: Qualified leads in 30 days—or your money back

personality: Deep understanding of exotic rental industry
No fluff - focuses on ROI and proven results
key_messages: Stop leaving money on the table
One dashboard to rule it all
The all in one growth engine
You didn't start this business to answer DMs all day
ctas: See How It Works For You

display.usage: Headlines, titles, hero text, large callouts

buttons.primary: px-8 py-4 bg-[#375DEE] hover:bg-[#4169E1] text-white rounded-full transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: px-8 py-4 text-white/80 border border-white/20 hover:border-[#375DEE]/50 rounded-full
buttons.ghost: px-8 py-4 bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 text-white border border-white/20 rounded-full

cards.highlighted: p-6 md:p-10 rounded-2xl border border-[#375DEE]/30 bg-[#375DEE]/5

inputs.default: px-4 py-3.5 rounded-xl bg-white/5 border border-white/20 text-white placeholder:text-white/50 focus:border-[#375DEE]

before: No idea what's working or not
problems: Can't respond fast enough - leads book competitors

not_this: Generic marketing agency that disappears after setup
Agencies providing leads with zero follow-up
instead: Done-for-you systems built specifically for YOUR fleet
24/7 AI that knows your vehicles and pricing
Real-time dashboard showing exactly what's working
Growth partnership - we only win when you win

timeline.name: Strategy Call
timeline.description: We map out your growth plan

timeline.name: Launch
timeline.description: Ads go live, leads start flowing

survey_questions: How many vehicles are currently in your fleet? (1-3, 4-7, 8-15, 16+)
What percentage of weekdays are typically booked? (<25%, 25-50%, 50-75%, 75%+)
Where do most of your bookings come from today?
What's the biggest thing holding back more bookings right now?
Name + best phone number to reach you
